++ GK Recipe Tortillas

+++ Notes

  * Makes 2 pretty large tortillas (~??? inches,mm)
   

+++ Ingredients
    * 1 cup flour
    * 2 tbsp olive oil
    * 1/4 water
    * pinch salt
    
    
+++ Directions
    * Mix all together in bowl. Add little water or 
           flour as necessary, kneading until smooth.
           
    * Turn skillet on pretty high (4-5). No oil needed.
      Place on skillet VERY briefly (>20 seconds).
      Should see bubbling. Flip


+++ NOTES

  * Recommend making while cooking FoodRecipeRefriedBeans
